name: Asteroid Smash (bwg)
description:
You have been hired to collect micro stars from inside asteroids but your drill breaks.  Right before you were going to give up, an enemy ship from a rouge mercenary group heads straight towards you.  You realize that his ship is strong enough to destroy the asteroids and that way your boss won't get mad.  

Use the WASD keys to control your ship.  Avoid direct contact with the enemy ship or receive damage.  WARNING: The enemy ship will start trying to ram you the second you start.  Use his AI to destroy the asteroids, and collect the various stars inside.  There a total of 5 throughout the map.
